thread.title: Computer Design & Integration LLC (CDI LLC) Announces the Appointment of Jason Kalvesmaki to Vice President of Sales

author: cnbc.com
title: Computer Design & Integration LLC (CDI LLC) Announces the Appointment of Jason Kalvesmaki to Vice President of Sales
text:
Promotion positions hybrid integrator to accelerate digital transformation
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Computer Design & Integration LLC (CDI LLC) announced today the promotion of Jason Kalvesmaki to Vice President of Sales. In this role, Kalvesmaki will be focused on the development, as well as the continued sales and technical execution of CDI’s Hybrid Cloud Automation Framework (HCAF) and its go-to-market strategy.
Kalvesmaki will also continue to lead a team of high-performance sales, engineering and solutions delivery professionals in the implementation of hybrid cloud and automation, enterprise service and operations management, digital transformation, mobility and traditional data center infrastructure solutions across CDI’s most strategic customers and business partners.
“HCAF has quickly become our most relevant growth area and product offering to our enterprise customers,” said Kalvesmaki. “The ability to deliver true time-to-value acceleration and predictable outcomes across software defined, multi-cloud automated ecosystems, have garnered deep customer adoption and fueled tremendous growth and a record year in 2017. I look forward to continuing that momentum in my new role and bringing tangible thought-leadership to our customers while enabling digital transformation.”
“Jason’s leadership, guidance and entrepreneurial spirit have been instrumental to our continued success and growth,” said Rich Falcone, President, Sales, CDI LLC. “He understands just how quickly the industry is changing and this move further emphasizes our mission to be at the forefront of those changes. There is no one better poised than Jason to help us redefine and emphasize our strategic mission of driving greater efficiency for our enterprise customers through a hybrid operating model.”
In addition to holding a B.S. in Information Science and a minor in Computer Science from the University of Pittsburgh, Kalvesmaki has almost two decades of broad experience in information technology and business -- ranging from software development to sales and leadership.
About Computer Design & Integration LLC (CDI LLC):
CDI LLC was founded in 1995, with corporate headquarters in New York City, as well as office locations in Teterboro, N.J., Philadelphia, Charlotte and Atlanta. The firm has been recognized as one of the nation’s top 500 IT solution providers offering clients and businesses of all sizes the most up-to-date hybrid IT technology solutions that solve today’s most complex business challenges. CDI LLC continually focuses on achieving client satisfaction by developing and implementing comprehensive and innovative technology solutions that enhance day-to-day business workflow processes. As one of the largest solution providers, CDI LLC combines the required experience, exceptional talent, quality assurance and stability that its clients strive to achieve.
